title: PyArrow error while preprocessing CSV dataset via the CLI
body:
**Describe the bug**
Failure in dataset preprocessing when running the hyperopt CLI.

**To Reproduce**
`ludwig hyperopt --config rotten_tomatoes_config.yaml --dataset rotten_tomatoes.csv`

**Stacktrace**
```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/bin/ludwig", line 8, in <module>
    sys.exit(main())
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ludwig/cli.py", line 172, in main
    CLI()
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ludwig/cli.py", line 67, in __init__
    getattr(self, args.command)()
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ludwig/cli.py", line 92, in hyperopt
    hyperopt_cli.cli(sys.argv[2:])
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ludwig/hyperopt_cli.py", line 409, in cli
    hyperopt_cli(**vars(args))
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ludwig/hyperopt_cli.py", line 161, in hyperopt_cli
    return hyperopt(
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ludwig/hyperopt/run.py", line 311, in hyperopt
    training_set, validation_set, test_set, training_set_metadata = model.preprocess(
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ludwig/api.py", line 1296, in preprocess
    preprocessed_data = preprocess_for_training(
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ludwig/data/preprocessing.py", line 1633, in preprocess_for_training
    training_dataset = backend.dataset_manager.create(training_set, config, training_set_metadata)
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ludwig/data/dataset/ray.py", line 142, in create
    return RayDataset(dataset, get_proc_features(config), training_set_metadata, self.backend)
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ludwig/data/dataset/ray.py", line 76, in __init__
    self.ds = self.df_engine.to_ray_dataset(df) if not isinstance(df, str) else read_remote_parquet(df)
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ludwig/data/dataset/ray.py", line 62, in read_remote_parquet
    return read_parquet(path, filesystem=PyFileSystem(FSSpecHandler(fs)))
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ray/data/read_api.py", line 371, in read_parquet
    return read_datasource(
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ray/data/read_api.py", line 231, in read_datasource
    read_tasks = ray.get(
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ray/_private/client_mode_hook.py", line 105, in wrapper
    return func(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ray/worker.py", line 1809, in get
    raise value.as_instanceof_cause()
ray.exceptions.RayTaskError(ArrowInvalid): ray::_prepare_read() (pid=2594, ip=10.1.45.102)
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ray/data/read_api.py", line 902, in _prepare_read
    return ds.prepare_read(parallelism, **kwargs)
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ray/data/datasource/parquet_datasource.py", line 200, in prepare_read
    pq_ds = pq.ParquetDataset(
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/pyarrow/parquet.py", line 1309, in __new__
    return _ParquetDatasetV2(
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/pyarrow/parquet.py", line 1726, in __init__
    self._dataset = ds.dataset(path_or_paths, filesystem=filesystem,
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/pyarrow/dataset.py", line 680, in dataset
    return _filesystem_dataset(source, **kwargs)
  File "/home/ray/anaconda3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/pyarrow/dataset.py", line 433, in _filesystem_dataset
    factory = FileSystemDatasetFactory(fs, paths_or_selector, format, options)
  File "pyarrow/_dataset.pyx", line 2647, in pyarrow._dataset.FileSystemDatasetFactory.__init__
  File "pyarrow/error.pxi", line 143, in pyarrow.lib.pyarrow_internal_check_status
  File "pyarrow/error.pxi", line 99, in pyarrow.lib.check_status
pyarrow.lib.ArrowInvalid: GetFileInfo() yielded path '/src/rotten_tomatoes.training.parquet/part.0.parquet', which is outside base dir 'rotten_tomatoes.training.parquet'
```

**Environment**

- Python version: 3.8.5
- Ludwig version: 0.6.dev


**Other context**

The dataset was downloaded from [this link](https://ludwig-ai.github.io/ludwig-docs/0.5/data/rotten_tomatoes_test.csv). Here's the config I'm using:
```
input_features:
    - name: genres
      type: set
      preprocessing:
          tokenizer: comma
    - name: content_rating
      type: category
    - name: top_critic
      type: binary
    - name: runtime
      type: number
    - name: review_content
      type: text
      encoder: embed
output_features:
    - name: recommended
      type: binary
hyperopt:
  goal: maximize
  output_feature: recommended
  metric: accuracy
  split: 
  parameters:validation
    training.learning_rate:
      space: loguniform
      lower: 0.0001
      upper: 0.1
    training.optimizer.type:
      space: choice
      categories: [sgd, adam, adagrad]
    review_content.embedding_size:
      space: choice
      categories: [128, 256]
  search_alg:
    type: variant_generator
  executor:
    num_samples: 10
```
